This then was the lot<S>1486</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> by their families<S>4940</S>; even to the border<S>1366</S> of Edom<S>123</S> the wilderness<S>4057</S> of Zin<S>6790</S> southward<S>5045</S> was the uttermost part<S>7097</S> of the south coast<S>8486</S>.
And their south<S>5045</S> border<S>1366</S> was from the shore<S>7097</S> of the salt<S>4417</S> sea<S>3220</S>, from the bay<S>3956</S> that looketh<S>6437</S> southward<S>5045</S>: <sup>bay: Heb. tongue</sup>
And it went out<S>3318</S> to the south side<S>5045</S> to Maalehacrabbim<S>4610</S>, and passed<S>5674</S> along to Zin<S>6790</S>, and ascended up<S>5927</S> on the south side<S>5045</S> unto Kadeshbarnea<S>6947</S>, and passed<S>5674</S> along to Hezron<S>2696</S>, and went up<S>5927</S> to Adar<S>146</S>, and fetched a compass<S>5437</S> to Karkaa<S>7173</S>: <sup>Maalehacrebbim: or, the going up to Acrabbim</sup>
From thence it passed<S>5674</S> toward Azmon<S>6111</S>, and went out<S>3318</S> unto the river<S>5158</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>; and the goings out<S>8444</S> of that coast<S>1366</S> were at the sea<S>3220</S>: this shall be your south<S>5045</S> coast<S>1366</S>.
And the east<S>6924</S> border<S>1366</S> was the salt<S>4417</S> sea<S>3220</S>, even unto the end<S>7097</S> of Jordan<S>3383</S>. And their border<S>1366</S> in the north<S>6828</S> quarter<S>6285</S> was from the bay<S>3956</S> of the sea<S>3220</S> at the uttermost part<S>7097</S> of Jordan<S>3383</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> to Bethhogla<S>1031</S>, and passed<S>5674</S> along by the north<S>6828</S> of Betharabah<S>1026</S>; and the border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> to the stone<S>68</S> of Bohan<S>932</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> toward Debir<S>1688</S> from the valley<S>6010</S> of Achor<S>5911</S>, and so northward<S>6828</S>, looking<S>6437</S> toward Gilgal<S>1537</S>, that is before<S>5227</S> the going up<S>4608</S> to Adummim<S>131</S>, which is on the south side<S>5045</S> of the river<S>5158</S>: and the border<S>1366</S> passed<S>5674</S> toward the waters<S>4325</S> of Enshemesh<S>5885</S>, and the goings out<S>8444</S> thereof were at Enrogel<S>5883</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> by the valley<S>1516</S> of the son<S>1121</S> of Hinnom<S>2011</S> unto the south<S>5045</S> side<S>3802</S> of the Jebusite<S>2983</S>; the same is Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: and the border<S>1366</S> went up<S>5927</S> to the top<S>7218</S> of the mountain<S>2022</S> that lieth before<S>6440</S> the valley<S>1516</S> of Hinnom<S>2011</S> westward<S>3220</S>, which is at the end<S>7097</S> of the valley<S>6010</S> of the giants<S>7497</S> northward<S>6828</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> was drawn<S>8388</S> from the top<S>7218</S> of the hill<S>2022</S> unto the fountain<S>4599</S> of the water<S>4325</S> of Nephtoah<S>5318</S>, and went out<S>3318</S> to the cities<S>5892</S> of mount<S>2022</S> Ephron<S>6085</S>; and the border<S>1366</S> was drawn<S>8388</S> to Baalah<S>1173</S>, which is Kirjathjearim<S>7157</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> compassed<S>5437</S> from Baalah<S>1173</S> westward<S>3220</S> unto mount<S>2022</S> Seir<S>8165</S>, and passed<S>5674</S> along unto the side<S>3802</S> of mount<S>2022</S> Jearim<S>3297</S>, which is Chesalon<S>3693</S>, on the north side<S>6828</S>, and went down<S>3381</S> to Bethshemesh<S>1053</S>, and passed on<S>5674</S> to Timnah<S>8553</S>:
And the border<S>1366</S> went out<S>3318</S> unto the side<S>3802</S> of Ekron<S>6138</S> northward<S>6828</S>: and the border<S>1366</S> was drawn<S>8388</S> to Shicron<S>7942</S>, and passed along<S>5674</S> to mount<S>2022</S> Baalah<S>1173</S>, and went out<S>3318</S> unto Jabneel<S>2995</S>; and the goings out<S>8444</S> of the border<S>1366</S> were at the sea<S>3220</S>.
And the west<S>3220</S> border<S>1366</S> was to the great<S>1419</S> sea<S>3220</S>, and the coast<S>1366</S> thereof. This is the coast<S>1366</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> round about<S>5439</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And unto Caleb<S>3612</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jephunneh<S>3312</S> he gave<S>5414</S> a part<S>2506</S> among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, according<S>413</S> to the commandment<S>6310</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> to Joshua<S>3091</S>, even the city<S>7151</S> of Arba<S>704</S> <S>7153</S> the father<S>1</S> of Anak<S>6061</S>, which city is Hebron<S>2275</S>. <sup>the city: or, Kirjatharba</sup>
And Caleb<S>3612</S> drove<S>3423</S> thence the three<S>7969</S> sons<S>1121</S> of Anak<S>6061</S>, Sheshai<S>8344</S>, and Ahiman<S>289</S>, and Talmai<S>8526</S>, the children<S>3211</S> of Anak<S>6061</S>.
And he went up<S>5927</S> thence to the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Debir<S>1688</S>: and the name<S>8034</S> of Debir<S>1688</S> before<S>6440</S> was Kirjathsepher<S>7158</S>.
And Caleb<S>3612</S> said<S>559</S>, He that smiteth<S>5221</S> Kirjathsepher<S>7158</S>, and taketh<S>3920</S> it, to him will I give<S>5414</S> Achsah<S>5915</S> my daughter<S>1323</S> to wife<S>802</S>.
And Othniel<S>6274</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Kenaz<S>7073</S>, the brother<S>251</S> of Caleb<S>3612</S>, took<S>3920</S> it: and he gave<S>5414</S> him Achsah<S>5915</S> his daughter<S>1323</S> to wife<S>802</S>.
And it came to pass, as she came<S>935</S> unto him, that she moved<S>5496</S> him to ask<S>7592</S> of her father<S>1</S> a field<S>7704</S>: and she lighted off<S>6795</S> her ass<S>2543</S>; and Caleb<S>3612</S> said<S>559</S> unto her, What wouldest thou?
Who answered<S>559</S>, Give<S>5414</S> me a blessing<S>1293</S>; for thou hast given<S>5414</S> me a south<S>5045</S> land<S>776</S>; give<S>5414</S> me also springs<S>1543</S> of water<S>4325</S>. And he gave<S>5414</S> her the upper<S>5942</S> springs<S>1543</S>, and the nether<S>8482</S> springs<S>1543</S>.
This is the inheritance<S>5159</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> according to their families<S>4940</S>.
And the uttermost<S>7097</S> cities<S>5892</S> of the tribe<S>4294</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> toward the coast<S>1366</S> of Edom<S>123</S> southward<S>5045</S> were Kabzeel<S>6909</S>, and Eder<S>5740</S>, and Jagur<S>3017</S>,
And Kinah<S>7016</S>, and Dimonah<S>1776</S>, and Adadah<S>5735</S>,

And Hazor<S>2674</S>, Hadattah<S>2675</S>, and Kerioth<S>7152</S>, and Hezron<S>2696</S>, which is Hazor<S>2674</S>,

And Hazarshual<S>2705</S>, and Beersheba<S>884</S>, and Bizjothjah<S>964</S>,

And Jiphtah<S>3316</S>, and Ashnah<S>823</S>, and Nezib<S>5334</S>,
And Keilah<S>7084</S>, and Achzib<S>392</S>, and Mareshah<S>4762</S>; nine<S>8672</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>:
Ekron<S>6138</S>, with her towns<S>1323</S> and her villages<S>2691</S>:
From Ekron<S>6138</S> even unto the sea<S>3220</S>, all that lay near<S>3027</S> Ashdod<S>795</S>, with their villages<S>2691</S>: <sup>near: Heb. by the place of</sup>
Ashdod<S>795</S> with her towns<S>1323</S> and her villages<S>2691</S>, Gaza<S>5804</S> with her towns<S>1323</S> and her villages<S>2691</S>, unto the river<S>5158</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, and the great<S>1419</S> <S>1366</S> sea<S>3220</S>, and the border<S>1366</S> thereof:
And in the mountains<S>2022</S>, Shamir<S>8069</S>, and Jattir<S>3492</S>, and Socoh<S>7755</S>,
And Dannah<S>1837</S>, and Kirjathsannah<S>7158</S>, which is Debir<S>1688</S>,

And Goshen<S>1657</S>, and Holon<S>2473</S>, and Giloh<S>1542</S>; eleven<S>259</S> <S>6240</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>:
Arab<S>694</S>, and Dumah<S>1746</S>, and Eshean<S>824</S>,
And Janum<S>3241</S>, and Bethtappuah<S>1054</S>, and Aphekah<S>664</S>, <sup>Janum: or, Janus</sup>
And Humtah<S>2547</S>, and Kirjatharba<S>7153</S>, which is Hebron<S>2275</S>, and Zior<S>6730</S>; nine<S>8672</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>:
Maon<S>4584</S>, Carmel<S>3760</S>, and Ziph<S>2128</S>, and Juttah<S>3194</S>,
And Jezreel<S>3157</S>, and Jokdeam<S>3347</S>, and Zanoah<S>2182</S>,

Halhul<S>2478</S>, Bethzur<S>1049</S>, and Gedor<S>1446</S>,
And Maarath<S>4638</S>, and Bethanoth<S>1042</S>, and Eltekon<S>515</S>; six<S>8337</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>:
Kirjathbaal<S>7154</S>, which is Kirjathjearim<S>7157</S>, and Rabbah<S>7237</S>; two<S>8147</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>:
In the wilderness<S>4057</S>, Betharabah<S>1026</S>, Middin<S>4081</S>, and Secacah<S>5527</S>,
And Nibshan<S>5044</S>, and the city of Salt<S>5898</S>, and Engedi<S>5872</S>; six<S>8337</S> cities<S>5892</S> with their villages<S>2691</S>.
As for the Jebusites<S>2983</S> the inhabitants<S>3427</S> of Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> could<S>3201</S> <S>3201</S> not drive them out<S>3423</S>: but the Jebusites<S>2983</S> dwell<S>3427</S> with the children<S>1121</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S> unto this day<S>3117</S>.
